Subject: SMTP issues
Description: We are configuring an external SMTP server on our CoSoSys hosted instance (https://35ylwgp.hosted.endpointprotector.com) but out test messages are not received. Are there firewall rules that need to be opened from the hosted environment or are there updated configuration guidance that can be shared with us? Our smtp server is: mx0a-00158602.pphosted.com (67.231.149.12) Thank you in advance, Andrew
What_We_Know__c: the customer needs outbound port 25 to be opened on AWS instance.
Next_Steps__c: the request was sent to AWS and we are waiting for them to open it.
Solution_Comment__c: The port was opened by AWS.
